"pl", IF($User.Alias ="Sz1011","tel +48 505 038 114", IF($User.Alias ="trusgu2","tel +48 571 808 009", IF($User.Alias ="trumsk","tel +48 511 031 406", IF($User.Alias ="Pi8621","tel +48 799 073 897", IF($User.Alias ="Ma7340","tel +48 690 535 405", "Biuro +48 22 462 64 00"))))),
"es", "+34 91 18 29 472", "nl", "Tel +31 20 709 1235", "it", "+39 029 4754586",

"UK +44 (0)20 3364 5906"
